chart.title: Installed geothermal energy capacity
chart.subtitle: Cumulative installed capacity of geothermal energy, measured in megawatts.

Geothermal capacity (total).descriptionShort: Total geothermal (on- and off-grid) electricity installed capacity, measured in megawatts.
Geothermal capacity (total).citationShort: IRENA (2025) – processed by Our World in Data
